post.description: This API associates agents to a department.

get.description: This API fetches the details of a department from your help desk

patch.description: This API updates the details of an existing department.

get.description: This API fetches the logo set for a department.

parameters.name: fileSize
parameters.description: Size of the image file to download. Values allowed are @THUMBNAIL@ (image with reduced dimensions and size) and @ACTUAL@ (image with actual dimensions and size). The default value is @ACTUAL@.

schema.description: Size of the image file to download. Values allowed are @THUMBNAIL@ (image with reduced dimensions and size) and @ACTUAL@ (image with actual dimensions and size). The default value is @ACTUAL@.

post.description: This API updates the logo set for a department.

delete.description: This API removes the logo set for a department.

post.description: This API enables a department in your help desk portal.
This API disables a department in your help desk portal.

get.summary: Get department details by department IDs
get.description: This API fetches the details of the departments whose IDs are passed in the API request.

parameters.name: departmentIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated array of department IDs. Maximum number of IDs allowed is 50.

schema.description: Comma-separated array of department IDs. Maximum number of IDs allowed is 50.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: Comma-separated array of department IDs. Maximum number of IDs allowed is 50.

get.description: This API lists the agents in a department.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: Name of the field that must be used for searching and listing agents. Values allowed are: @firstName@, @lastName@, @name@, and @emailId@.

schema.description: Name of the field that must be used for searching and listing agents. Values allowed are: @firstName@, @lastName@, @name@, and @emailId@.

parameters.name: isLightAgent
parameters.description: Key that denotes if the agents must be light or non light.

schema.description: Key that denotes if the agents must be light or non light.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: To sort the available list of agents in either ascending or descending order. Values allowed are: @asc@ or @desc@

schema.description: To sort the available list of agents in either ascending or descending order. Values allowed are: @asc@ or @desc@

parameters.name: isConfirmed
parameters.description: Key that denotes if the agents must be confirmed or unconfirmed.

schema.description: Key that denotes if the agents must be confirmed or unconfirmed.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Key that filters agents, based on their activation status: @ACTIVE@ or @DISABLED@

schema.description: Key that filters agents, based on their activation status: @ACTIVE@ or @DISABLED@

get.description: This API returns the number of departments configured in your help desk portal.

post.description: This API dissociates agents from a department.

get.summary: Get associable agents in a department
get.description: This API lists the associable agents in a department in your helpdesk.
This API lists a particular number of departments, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: chatStatus
parameters.description: Key that filters departments based on their chat status. Values allowed are @AVAILABLE@, @DISABLED@, @NOT_CREATED@, and @${UNAVAILABLE}@. @${UNAVAILABLE}@ refers to departments which are not available for chat.

schema.description: Key that filters departments based on their chat status. Values allowed are @AVAILABLE@, @DISABLED@, @NOT_CREATED@, and @${UNAVAILABLE}@. @${UNAVAILABLE}@ refers to departments which are not available for chat.

parameters.name: isEnabled
parameters.description: Key that filters departments based on their enabled status

schema.description: Key that filters departments based on their enabled status

post.description: This API adds a department to your help desk portal.

get.description: This API checks if multiple departments have the same name.

parameters.name: departmentName
parameters.description: Name of the department for which you want to check duplicate entries

schema.description: Name of the department for which you want to check duplicate entries

get.description: This API lists departments, based on the last fetched time specified.

parameters.name: lastFetchedTime
parameters.description: Key that filters departments after a specific time. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

schema.description: Key that filters departments after a specific time. Enter a date in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

parameters.name: bulkUpdateOffset
parameters.description: Number of bulk record already fetched

schema.description: Number of bulk record already fetched

data.name: Zylker

data.name: zPad
data.description: zPad is the most advanced tablet that brings you the never-experienced-before processing power.

searchStr.name: searchStr
searchStr.description: String to search for agents by first name, last name, or email ID. The string must contain at least one character. Three search methods are supported: 1) string* - Searches for agents whose first name, last name, or email ID start with the string, 2) *string* - Searches for agents whose first name, last name, or email ID contain the string, 3) string - Searches for agents whose first name, last name, or email ID is an exact match for the string

schema.description: String to search for agents by first name, last name, or email ID. The string must contain at least one character. Three search methods are supported: 1) string* - Searches for agents whose first name, last name, or email ID start with the string, 2) *string* - Searches for agents whose first name, last name, or email ID contain the string, 3) string - Searches for agents whose first name, last name, or email ID is an exact match for the string

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of agents to fetch; default value is 10 and maximum value is 200

schema.description: Number of agents to fetch; default value is 10 and maximum value is 200

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the agents must be listed

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the agents must be listed

isVisibleInCustomerPortal.description: Key that denotes if the department is visible in the help center or not
